message.content:
Subject: Notification of My Departure from the Company

Dear [Boss's Name],

I am writing to inform you that I have decided to leave the company, effective [Date of Last Day of Work]. I have appreciated the opportunities that [Company Name] has provided me during my time here, and I am grateful for the experience and knowledge gained.

I want to thank you for your support and guidance throughout my tenure. I am committed to ensuring a smooth transition of my responsibilities and completing any outstanding tasks before my departure. I will do my best to ensure that my departure does not disrupt the normal functioning of the team and the company.

Please let me know how I can assist with the transition process and if there is anything specific you would like me to focus on before I leave. I am happy to answer any questions and provide any necessary information to ensure a seamless transition.

Thank you again for the opportunity to work at [Company Name]. I wish the company continued success in the future.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
